p.q0: Mariela's students are going to listen to a song of a famous singer. Here is the chorus of the song:
p.q: Now, Mariela wants her students to improve their productive skills through a post-listening task. Which of the following tasks is it least appropriate to use?

as.a: The students are given a copy of the song with some blanks to be filled in. They get in pairs and complete the blanks.
The students receive a copy of the song. The teacher asks them to choose their favorite verse and explain the reasons for their choice.
The students create a dialogue between the singer and his lover. The students practice their dialogue for some minutes and present it to the class.
